entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Hart Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Hart Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hart Island 6:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: SE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the evening. Snow mixed with rain overnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast late in the evening and overnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
